MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA9 postcode area of Prestwick. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5pm to make repairs to an underground cable fault located outside of 11 Orangefield Drive and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:10pm on Thursday, 25th February 2021
